alert.note: Alert for Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 09 at 9:21AM EST until March 09 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM EST FOR CENTRAL WAKULLA AND SOUTHEASTERN LIBERTY COUNTIES... At 921 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 13 miles west of Crawfordville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Crawfordville around 950 AM EST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Sanborn, Tully and Arran. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
